content: Hello everyoneI decrypted the phase 2 and phase 3 of the puzzle The puzzle GSMG.IOhttps://privatekeys.pw/puzzles/gsmg-puzzleIt gaves me a plaintext flag** (e.g., `FLAG{...}`).   . My question is: what is the method to use it to unlock the address and claim the reward https://gsmg.io/choiceisanillusioncreatedbetweenthosewithpowerandthosewithoutaveryspecialdessertiwroteitmyself
